title: Can not build gazebo on Arch linux from source with gcc 9.2.0

content.raw:
I am trying to install Gazebo from the source, and version 10, both o them on arch Linux, gcc version is 9.2.0.

I am getting the following error during the installation:

`/meta/.cache/yay/gazebo-hg/src/gazebo/gazebo/util/OpenAL.cc:72:47: error: cannot convert ‘ALCdevice*’ to ‘ALCdevice_struct*’ in assignment`

`72 |     this->dataPtr->audioDevice = alcOpenDevice(NULL);`  
`|                                  ~~~~~~~~~^~`  
`|                       ~~~~~~~~~^`  
`|                                      |`  
`|                                      ALCcontext_struct*`

Also this error is repeated wherever `‘ALCdevice_struct*’` is used in the same file.

Any thoughts ?

Best regards,

‌
content.html:
I am trying to install Gazebo from the source, and version 10, both o them on arch Linux, gcc version is 9.2.0.

I am getting the following error during the installation:

/meta/.cache/yay/gazebo-hg/src/gazebo/gazebo/util/OpenAL.cc:72:47: error: cannot convert ‘ALCdevice*’ to ‘ALCdevice_struct*’ in assignment

72 | this->dataPtr->audioDevice = alcOpenDevice(NULL);
| ~~~~~~~~~^~
| ~~~~~~~~~^
| |
| ALCcontext_struct*

Also this error is repeated wherever ‘ALCdevice_struct*’ is used in the same file.

Any thoughts ?

Best regards,

‌
